sentences.en: ...a quick dip of his toe into the water.
sentences.cn: …他的脚趾头在水里快速的一蘸。

sentences.en: Are you coming in for a dip?
sentences.cn: 你游一会儿吗？

sentences.en: Dip each apple in the syrup until thickly coated.
sentences.cn: 把每个苹果在糖浆里蘸一下，直到被厚厚地裹上糖浆。

sentences.en: Dip the pieces so they are completely coated.
sentences.cn: 把切片浸一浸，使其完全被包裹。

sentences.en: Dip your head under the low arch.
sentences.cn: 在低矮的门拱下要低头.

sentences.en: I nearly dipped out of the course.
sentences.cn: 我几乎半途而废。

sentences.en: I noticed little things, a dip of the head, a twitch in the shoulder.
sentences.cn: 我注意到了一些细节：头的往下一沉，肩膀的突然颤动。

sentences.en: I think the water's too cold to swim, so I'll just dip a toe in.
sentences.cn: 我看水太凉,不能游泳, 所以只能稍微浸一下.

sentences.en: I'll allow the children to dip their bread into the soup.
sentences.cn: 我让孩子们把面包浸在汤里吃.

sentences.en: I'm just going for a dip.
sentences.cn: 我只是去泡一会儿水.

sentences.en: Just when she was ready to dip into her savings, Greg hastened to her rescue.
sentences.cn: 正当她准备动用自己的存款时，格雷格赶来给她救了急。

sentences.en: Let's dip the sheep.
sentences.cn: 咱们用消毒水洗羊.

sentences.en: On a hot day a dip in the sea is sheer paradise.
sentences.cn: 热天洗个海水澡是十分令人惬意的事.

sentences.en: One dip into the bottle should do an entire nail.
sentences.cn: 往瓶子里蘸一下的量就应该能涂满整个指甲。

sentences.en: Put the presents in the middle of the room so that everyone can dip in.
sentences.cn: 把礼物放在屋子中间,这样每个人都能分享到.

sentences.en: The dip increased as we went on.
sentences.cn: 我们越往前走,坡度越大.

sentences.en: Then we could go dip ourselves in any color we wanted.
sentences.cn: 那样我们就可以想要什么颜色就浸在什么颜色里了。

sentences.en: This may encourage gold traders to dip their toes back into the markets.
sentences.cn: 这可能会促使黄金交易商谨慎地尝试重返市场。

sentences.en: Topped with Parmesan cheese, no one will ever know this hot white bean and artichoke dip is healthy.
sentences.cn: 把意大利干酪铺在顶上，没有人会知道这热浸白豆和朝鲜蓟是很健康的。

sentences.en: Watch your fingers as you dip into the pot.
sentences.cn: 把手伸进锅里时当心你的手指头。

sentences.en: Where the road makes a dip, turn right.
sentences.cn: 在下坡处，向右转。

words.tran_cn: 长柄勺；浸染工；[鸟] 河鸟
下沉，下降；倾斜；浸渍，蘸湿

phrases.tran_cn: （尤指为了试温度）将脚趾在（水）中蘸一下
n. 浸焊；浸入焊接；沉浸钎焊
[口语]去(河、海水里等)洗个澡，泡一泡
电压骤降；电压突跌；电压下降；电压瞬时跌落

trans.tran_cn: 减少，低洼处，药浴液，蘸酱，(短时的)游泳，泡水，浏览

trans.tran_en: to put something into a liquid and lift it out again

trans.tran_cn: 浸，蘸，下降，减少，浏览，给(动物)洗药浴，将(汽车前灯)调为近光
trans.tran_en: to put something into a liquid and lift it out again
to put something into a liquid and lift it out again
